named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_PAYMENT_SOURCES_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps WHERE ps.person.id = :personId AND ps.inactive = false ORDER BY ps.type

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_PAYMENT_SOURCES_BY_PERSON_ID_TYPES
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps WHERE ps.person.id = :personId AND ps.type IN (:paymentTypes) AND ps.inactive = false ORDER BY ps.type

named-query.name: READ_PAYMENT_SOURCE_BY_PERSON_ID_PROFILE
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM com.mpower.domain.PaymentSource ps WHERE ps.person.id = :personId AND ps.profile = :profile

named-query.name: READ_GIFTS_BY_PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT gift FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE gift.paymentSource.id = :paymentSourceId
